fuzzing_params.Constraints: 1 <= word1.length <= 10^6, 1 <= word2.length <= 10^4. word1 and word2 consist only of lowercase English letters.

problem_info.title: 3298. Count Substrings That Can Be Rearranged to Contain a String II
test_examples: Example 1: Input: word1 =  bcca , word2 =  abc  Output: 1 Explanation: The only valid substring is  bcca  which can be rearranged to  abcc  having  abc  as a prefix.
Example 2: Input: word1 =  abcabc , word2 =  abc  Output: 10 Explanation: All the substrings except substrings of size 1 and size 2 are valid.
